lead_paragraph: Jeremy Bonderman was perfect for five innings and sublime for 8 1-3 in leading Detroit to an 8-3 victory in Game 4 on Saturday to win the A.L. playoff series and eliminate the Yankees.
snippet: Jeremy Bonderman was perfect for five innings and sublime for 8 1-3 in leading Detroit to an 8-3 victory in Game 4 on Saturday to win the A.L. playoff series and eliminate the Yankees.
